name: scarab-styleguide
description: Generate living styleguides from scarab-carapace config
author: Kyle Oliveiro <kyle@watchtower.digital>

scripts.sass:render: npm run sass:carapace && npm run sass:main
scripts.sass:split:
for file in dist/*.css
do
 sakugawa -n 9999999999 -m separate "$file" 
done
scripts.sass:minify:
for file in dist/*.css
do
 cssnano "$file" "$file".min 
done
scripts.sass:rename:
for file in dist/*.css.min
do
 mv "$file" "${file%.css.min}.min.css" 
done
scripts.sass: npm run sass:render && npm run sass:split && npm run sass:minify && npm run sass:rename
